en.key_stored_in_browser: These keys are stored in browser cache, clearing your browser storage will erase them.
en.you_are_using_temporary_key: You are using a temporary key. Do not hold any assets with this identity.
en.set_up_recovery_and_passkey: Clearing your browser storage will erase this key. Set up a recovery method to avoid losing access to your identity. Add a passkey to securely hold assets with this identity.
